```{r}
#| message: false
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
df <- read_tsv(here("data/raw/support.tsv"))
```

```{r}
df_untydier <- df |>
  mutate(diagnosis = paste(dzgroup, "," ,dzclass))
df_untydier <- df_untydier |> 
  select(age,death,sex,diagnosis,income,edu,charges,totcst,race)

df_untydier
```

```{r}
df_untydier |> write_csv(file=here("data/med_data.csv"))
```
